attributes.description:
Controls the minimum height of file upload area. Acceptable units: em, px, rem.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-min-height

Controls padding of file upload status area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-status-padding

Sets the border color of file upload status area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-status-border-color

Controls the border width of file upload status area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-status-border-width

Controls the border style of file upload status area. Acceptable values: solid, dashed, dotted, none.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-status-border-style

Sets the background color of file upload status area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-status-background

Controls the border radius of file upload status area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-status-radius

Controls bottom spacing of file upload status area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-status-bottom-space

Controls bottom spacing of file upload area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-bottom-space

Sets the text color of file upload titles.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-title-color

Controls the font size of file upload titles.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-title-font-size

Sets the font family of file upload titles.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-title-font-family

Controls the font weight of file upload titles. Acceptable values: normal, bold, 100-900.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-title-font-weight

Controls the line height of file upload titles.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-title-line-height

Sets the text color of file size information.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-size-color

Controls the font size of file size information.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-size-font-size

Sets the font family of file size information.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-size-font-family

Controls the font weight of file size information. Acceptable values: normal, bold, 100-900.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-size-font-weight

Controls the line height of file size information.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-size-line-height

Controls spacing between file upload elements.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-gap

Controls spacing between elements in drop box area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-drop-box-gap

Controls bottom spacing of drop box area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-drop-box-bottom-space

Sets the background color of drop box area.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-drop-box-background

Controls the border radius of multi-file upload items.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-multi-file-radius

Sets the text color of file upload message captions.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-caption-color

Controls the font size of file upload message captions.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-caption-font-size

Sets the font family of file upload message captions.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-caption-font-family

Controls the font weight of file upload message captions. Acceptable values: normal, bold, 100-900.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-caption-font-weight

Controls the line height of file upload message captions.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-caption-line-height

Sets the text color of file upload message anchors.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-anchor-color

Controls the font size of file upload message anchors.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-anchor-font-size

Sets the font family of file upload message anchors.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-anchor-font-family

Controls the font weight of file upload message anchors. Acceptable values: normal, bold, 100-900.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-anchor-font-weight

Controls the line height of file upload message anchors.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-message-anchor-line-height

Controls the size of file upload media icons.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-media-icon-size

Controls padding of file upload media icons.
CSS variable: --wm-file-upload-media-icon-padding
